title: Comparative Biochemistry and Physiology
additional-note: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. The front matter of the first issue lists both London and New York as publisher locations, and quotes subscription prices in both British pounds and US dollars.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
